medical_history.chief_complaint: Right sided abdominal pain and fever.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 3 days prior to admission, with decreased oral intake, decreased urine output, nausea, fever to 101, and right sided abdominal pain.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Non-insulin-dependent diabetes with neuropathy, hypertension, hyperlipidemia, chronic dyspnea on exertion, gastritis, status post meningioma resection, chronic low back pain, morbid obesity, obstructive sleep apnea without CPAP, osteopenia, history of incidental pulmonary nodules >3mm, <8mm.
